# Agent Skills

This folder contains role-specific skill guides for contributors and coding agents working in this repository.

## Available Skills
- [UX/UI Expert](./ux-ui-expert.md)
- [Frontend Engineer Expert](./frontend-engineer-expert.md)
- [QA Automation Expert](./qa-automation-expert.md)

## Usage
- Pick the skill that best matches the task.
- Follow project constraints in `.github/copilot-instructions.md`.
- Keep changes focused, minimal, and aligned with existing architecture and test patterns.
